abstract: The Shanghai Stock Exchange has approved the development of global exchange-traded funds by Chinese fund houses to track six overseas indexes including the Dow Jones industrial average, the Shanghai Securities News reported.
snippet: The Shanghai Stock Exchange has approved the development of global exchange-traded funds by Chinese fund houses to track six overseas indexes including the Dow Jones industrial average, the Shanghai Securities News reported.
lead_paragraph: The Shanghai Stock Exchange has approved the development of global exchange-traded funds by Chinese fund houses to track six overseas indexes including the Dow Jones industrial average, the Shanghai Securities News reported, citing Xu Ming, vice general manager of the exchange.

headline.main: Shanghai Exchange Said to Approve Global E.T.F.’s
